snippet: Alan Gilbert conducts the mezzo-soprano Stephanie Blythe in a new Sept. 11 song cycle by John Corigliano at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: Alan Gilbert conducts the mezzo-soprano Stephanie Blythe in a new Sept. 11 song cycle by John Corigliano at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.main: Song Cycle Places One Indelible Day Along History’s Bleak Continuum
headline.print_headline: Song Cycle Places One Indelible Day Along History’s Bleak Continuum
headline.seo: Stephanie Blythe and Philharmonic at Avery Fisher - Review
